name: Julius
description:
An open source re-implementation of Caesar III, with the same logic as the original, but with some UI enhancements, that is able to be played on multiple platforms.
UI enhancements include:
- Support for widescreen resolutions
- Windowed mode support for 32-bit desktops
- Several small in-game quality of life improvements
Julius requires the original assets (graphics, sounds, etc) from Caesar 3 to run.
